EmailTemplate.name: RS - SLP - Completed Change
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar Loan - Completed a Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!partnerName},
{!Lead.FullName} has {!Change_Order_Status__c} the changes to their Solar Loan application.
Login to your portal to review and process the application.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar {!Organization.Street} Boston, MA {!Organization.PostalCode}
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.786.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
